title: Product Brief Schema
description: A schema for defining product briefs with core components

product_name.description: Short, memorable name of the product

product_brief.description: Concise description of the product's purpose and core value proposition

pillars.description: Comma-separated list of the core functional components that make up the product's architecture. Each pillar should be a distinct part of the system with a specific responsibility in the overall product ecosystem.

pbrief.product_brief: A command-line tool for building standardized product specifications that can be used as context for LLM coding tools.
pbrief.pillars: CLI interface, specification generator, LLM context formatter, template library
